sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' function WatchList({watchlist,setWatchlist,removefromWatchlist}) { return (
{/* render the bots in cards */}
{ watchlist.map((bot)=>(
removeArmyHandler(bot)}/>
{bot.name}

{bot.catchphrase}

{/* style the bot details */}

H:{bot.health}

D:{bot.damage}

A:{bot.armor}

)) }
) } export default WatchList
